mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.business_id, t.function_id, t.approve_operation_id, t.submit_user, u2.user_name AS submitUserName, t.submit_time, t.approve_user, u3.user_name AS approveUserName, t.approve_time, t.approve_state, d.dict_value approveStateName, t.approve_opinion, t.confirm_state, d1.dict_value confirmStateName, t.confirm_user, u4.user_name AS confirmUserName, t.confirm_time, t.confirm_opinion, t.create_by, t.create_time, t.update_by, t.update_time, t.remark FROM confirm_operation_flow t LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.user_login = t.submit_user LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 ON u3.user_login = t.approve_user LEFT JOIN sys_user u4 ON u4.user_login = t.confirm_user LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d ON d.dict_code = t.approve_state and d.dict_type = 'approve_state' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d1 ON d1.dict_code = t.confirm_state and d1.dict_type = 'confirm_state' where t.id = #{id}
